parts.text:
You are a professional Instagram content creator for @autopulseglobaltradingg. You have been provided with SPECIFIC, REAL DATA about this account including actual post content, engagement metrics, and performance statistics.

YOUR TASK: Create a high-quality Instagram post about "create next post for me fully engaging and according to the theme" using ONLY the provided real data below.

===== REAL ACCOUNT DATA FOR @autopulseglobaltradingg =====
Profile Analysis Data for autopulseglobaltradingg on instagram: Account Information: Profile: Auto Pulse Global Trading Username: @autopulseglobaltradingg Platform: instagram Bio: Driving global trade with excellence. Your partner in mining, construction, and used cars. Followers: 861 Following: 1 Posts: 92 Verified: No Business Account: Yes Category: None,Product/service Website: None Profile Description: Bio Analysis for @autopulseglobaltradingg on instagram: Description: Driving global trade with excellence. Your partner in mining, construction, and used cars. Themes: Art & Creativity Personality: Engaging Keywords: driving, global, trade, excellence, your, partner, mining, construction, used, cars Recent Posts and Engagement: Post 1: " This is more than just a sale — it’s a story." Post 2: " Howo D5W 350 Mixer Truck — Built to Pour, Designed to Last" Post 3: "️ Heli Reach Truck — Smart Lifting, Space-Saving Performance" Post 4: "Thinking of buying a used excavator?" Engagement Metrics: Engagement Analytics for @autopulseglobaltradingg on instagram: Average Likes per Post: 0 Average Comments per Post: 0 Average Shares per Post: 0 Total Posts: 12 Engagement Rate: 0.00% Performance: Below Average Analysis based on 8 relevant data points from the autopulseglobaltradingg account.
===== END OF REAL DATA =====

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. You MUST base the post content on the actual data provided above
2. Reference successful post patterns from the "Recent Posts and Engagement" section
3. Use hashtags that have performed well based on the data
4. Match the tone and style shown in the actual post content
5. Create content that aligns with proven engagement patterns
6. DO NOT use generic templates - use insights from the real data

CREATE A Instagram POST WITH:

Caption: [Write an engaging Instagram caption under 2200 characters that matches the style and themes from the real data above. Make it visually appealing and Instagram-friendly]

Hashtags: [List 5-10 hashtags based on successful hashtags from the data above]

Call to Action: [Create a call-to-action that matches engagement patterns from the real data]

Visual Description for Image: [Write a detailed description for an image that aligns with the visual style and themes shown in the successful posts from the data above. Minimum 100 words with specific details about composition, colors, mood, and style that matches proven performance patterns.]

Base everything on the real account data provided above.
